card.title: ABOUT US
card.subtitle:
India, Explore!
Dream! Lead!
card.content:
Indian Media Syndicate endeavors to be the global leader in Exploration, Scientific Communications, Real Life Entertainment, serving passionate Explorers around the world generating scientific journalism that inspires, informs and entertains.

This is an Indian family of informational, educational and entertainment-oriented Television, Applications and Websites offering value to how Education is developed and accessed by the world.

card.title: OUR MISSION
card.subtitle: Lead the Indian Infotainment Media Revolution
card.content: By making every Information, every Discovery, every Invention, every Challenge accessible to every person in the India pacific Region

cards.cardcontent: In audio channels for all media labels. All Indic languages covered.
In Syndicate partnership, crafting the dream.

card.title: CORE VISION
card.subtitle: Break all Communication Barriers in Broadcast
card.content: By achieving real-time universal connection in a decentralized multi-linguistic Human society with technology at our disposal.

card.title: IMMERSIVE TEACHING
card.subtitle: A Strategy to Revolutionize Learning
card.content:
Grasping attention is easier, keeping learners engaged throughout the process and command action is a different story. We learn much faster visually, and retention is simply great if it is rewarding. In comes the array of Immersive education for new generation of India.

Putting our best foot forward, IMS resources are used in teaching the new wave of decision-makers. Integrating with schools and teaching organizations, creating the seamless streaming of knowledge like never before.

card.title: EXPLORERS
card.subtitle: Impactful programs for a global community of Changemakers
card.content: We fund a worldwide network of Explorers who investigate, evaluate theories, revolutionize, take imagination to new heights, and push the limitations of traditional thinking in ways that fundamentally change humanity.
